column5: Newest post is up  - it’s a video journal along with some pictures of our fly in fishing trip to Lake St Joseph with Slate Falls Outposts  We stayed at their Root Bay camp and it was an unbelievable week  Warning: video is a lot of my ugly mug talking but ideally it will give those who have never done a fly in an overview of what the week was like and for those who have done it before some perspective on Slate Falls Outposts and the Root Bay camp (Thumbs up all around)  https://www.northernjacks.com/post/root-bay-2020-video-journal  Thanks for checking it out and some new photos below for posterity  Andrew
